version_description:
• VoiceOver support! Binaural is now fully accessible via VoiceOver
• Removed pulsation from headphones icon
• Reduced rain sound volume on all settings
• Turned the overall volume up a notch
• Fixed control via headphones buttons

Thanks so much to all the testers!

Don't forget to leave a review or update your existing review ;)

• Full support for iOS 9 and the new iPad multitasking features
• 3D Touch home screen quick actions
• Redesigned Apple Watch app, now supporting watchOS 2
• Accessibility improvements
• Many small tweaks and polish

Binaural is now available for OS X, look for it in the Mac App Store!

You all wrote some amazing reviews that deserve to be read, so don't forget to update them for this version. Thanks so much to everyone who reviewed!

• Fully localized in Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, German, Italian
• The "X" band has been repurposed – it now turns the beats off entirely, so you can use Binaural as a pure noise machine
• Rain can now be much louder in relation to the beats at high settings
• Improved support for Siri's "Remind me of this" feature
• Now honors the "Reduce motion" accessibility setting
• Now uses the San Francisco font
• Themes are now Colors, and affect the color of some controls
• Fixed all known bugs
• Accessibility improvements
• Many small tweaks and polish

You all wrote some amazing reviews that deserve to be read, so don't forget to update them for this version. Thanks so much to everyone who reviewed!

• Added French localization
• Improved Chinese localization
• Many UI improvements
• Added keyboard shortcuts
• iPhone X support
• iOS 11 support
Fixed a bug with the "Seek backward" command

• Support for iOS 12
• Support for the new iPads
• UI improvements
• Fixed all known bugs
• Fixed a bug that would make Binaural look like it was playing when it wasn't.

• Improved experience when multitasking on iPhone X
• Fixed all known bugs
• Fixed a bug that would make Binaural look like it was playing when it wasn't.

• Support for iOS 12
• Support for the new iPads
• UI improvements
• Fixed all known bugs

• Support for iOS 13
• Two new Colors
• Twice as battery efficient when playing
• Can now log sessions to the Health app as "Mindful Minutes"
• User interface tweaks
• Settings are now directly inside the app
• Fixed all known bugs

• You can now control Binaural with your voice using Siri! You can say stuff like "play 5Hz in Binaural", "play alpha in Binaural", etc.
• You can now control Binaural via the Shortcuts app
• Add to Siri allows you to start your favorite sessions using a custom phrase
• Mouse pointer support on iPadOS
• Localization improvements
• Sound improvements
• Various user interface improvements
